Description:
Required Skills to be successfulAnalysis and problem solving
Effective communication and consultation
Excellent negotiation skills
Managing Senior management expectations and concerns What equips you for the roleBachelor’s degree or equivalent in Education, Management or Engineering 
Knowledge of adult learning processes, instructional design techniques, best practice learning tools and evaluation methodologies
Working knowledge and understanding of Automotive processes and systems
Must have a strong understanding or keen interest of electric vehicle technology, including the components and systems that make up EVs, as well as charging infrastructure and battery management systems.
A minimum of 3 years’ experience in training design, delivery, assessments and training technologies.Job Details
